ctaComponent.title: Entrust your project
ctaComponent.subtitle: to our experts
ctaComponent.message: Say something catchy, informative, and encouraging to click the button to go to the contact page. I like to add this banner at the bottom of each page.

cta.title: Focus on Clients. We'll Handle the Rest.
cta.text: See how we can transform your business with our complete, done-for-you system.

footer.p: Professional online systems for Thai massage businesses. Fully managed websites, booking, AI, reviews, and more. UK-based company with Thai and English support.
